candidates.reason: The topic discusses introduction to video outliner and importance of setting up a video transmitter, while the comment talks about drone flight controller and ESC. Although both are related to electronics, they don't seem strongly connected.
candidates.comment: T-Motor F722 Mini Stack 20020 features a compact design.It includes a flight controller (F722) and a 20A ESC (Electronic Speed Controller) with metal FETs (Field-Effect Transistors).The flight controller is based on the F722 chipset, providing advanced processing power for drone flight control.The 20A ESC features metal FETs, which enhance the performance and durability of the electronic speed controller.This stack is likely designed for smaller FPV (First-Person View) racing or freestyle drones..It comes with capacitor pre installed and is extremely easy to wire and set up.
candidates.url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=09c4bdKM5Kw:  T-Motor Stack With Metal Fets!! // T-Motor F722 Mini Stack 20020

candidates.reason: The comment discusses powering a receiver and mini/normal stacks for drones, which is not directly related to the topic of introducing video outliner and setting up a video transmitter.
candidates.comment: Can power the receiver on 3.3 or 5 volts depending on how you bridge the center pad with the left or the right one.The mini stack can power up to a 6s droneThe normal stack can be used with 3s-6s drones.
